title: DATS Data Type schema
description: The nature of the data, as determined for the information collected, the method used and the platform used.

information.description: The measurements or facts that the data is about.

method.description: The procedure or technology used to generate the information.

platform.description: The set of instruments, software and reagents that are needed to generated the data.

instrument.description: The specific device used to generate the data.
